<script setup lang="ts">
import type { NumberFieldRootEmits, NumberFieldRootProps } from 'reka-ui';
import { NumberFieldRoot, useForwardPropsEmits } from 'reka-ui';

const props = defineProps<NumberFieldRootProps>();
const emits = defineEmits<NumberFieldRootEmits>();

const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(props, emits);
</script>

<template>
  <NumberFieldRoot
    v-bind="forwarded"
    class="sigma-ui-number-field"
  >
    <slot />
  </NumberFieldRoot>
</template>

<style>
.sigma-ui-number-field {
  display: grid;
  gap: 0.375rem;
}
</style>

<script setup lang="ts">
import type { NumberFieldDecrementProps } from 'reka-ui';
import { NumberFieldDecrement, useForwardProps } from 'reka-ui';
import { MinusIcon } from 'lucide-vue-next';

const props = defineProps<NumberFieldDecrementProps>();

const forwarded = useForwardProps(props);
</script>

<template>
  <NumberFieldDecrement
    data-slot="decrement"
    v-bind="forwarded"
    class="sigma-ui-number-field-decrement"
  >
    <slot>
      <MinusIcon class="sigma-ui-number-field-decrement__icon" />
    </slot>
  </NumberFieldDecrement>
</template>

<style>
.sigma-ui-number-field-decrement {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
}

.sigma-ui-number-field-decrement:disabled {
  cursor: not-allowed;
  opacity: 0.2;
}

.sigma-ui-number-field-decrement__icon {
  width: 1rem;
  height: 1rem;
}
</style>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { NumberFieldInput } from 'reka-ui';

    class="sigma-ui-number-field-input"
  />

  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2.5rem;
  padding: 0.5rem;
  border: 1px solid hsl(var(--border));
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  background-color: transparent;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  text-align: center;

  color: hsl(var(--muted-foreground));
